post.summary: Creates a new absence
post.description:
You can create an absence by providing the absence in the body.
Addition information:
Start and end date are required.
But they are used differently based on the type of absence.
CompanyAbsence and PrivateAbsence are absences based on hours. This mean you need to set a utc based time to the start and end date.
Like: "2023-11-14T06:00:00Z"

All other absences are based on days or half days, Here you need to set the the start and end date like:
Start: "2023-11-03T00:00:00"
End: "2023-11-04T00:00:00"
For an absence of 1 day.
Start: "2023-11-03T00:00:00"
End: "2023-11-04T12:00:00"
For an absence of a half day.

get.summary:
Returns all non deleted entities.
Reduce result set by setting filters, like $filter=name eq 'test'

delete.summary: Deletes the absence with a specific id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the absence to delete

You can create a company by providing the company in the body.
Addition information:
Numbers: They are generated by the selected company types and their number settings.
Subsystems: If no subsystems are provided, the company is part master subsystems only.

put.summary: Updates a Text-Position with the given id.
put.description:
You can update a DocumentPositionEntity by providing the id and the TextPositionPut in the body.
In TextPositionPut-Model simply set the "Text"-Property to your new value.
If position with given Id not exists or has other DocumentPositionType then "TEXT" you will receive an error.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Text-Position-Id

put.summary:
Updates a position with given id for all possible DocumentPositionTypes (TEXT, FREETEXT and others).
The Type is inferred from position with id in database.
put.description:
You can update a DocumentPositionEntity by providing the id and the DocumentPositionEntityPut in the body.
You have to fill only the properties needed for the DocumentPositionType of the position.
If position with given Id not exists or has a DocumentPositionType not allowed for updates you will receive an error.
EXAMPLES:
TEXT: Only fill "Text"-Property of DocumentPositionEntityPut.
FREETEXT: Fill all properties of documentPositionEntityPut.
OTHERS: Fill the properties needed for the Type of position.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Position-Id

Returns service item with a specific id.

put.summary: Updates a service item with a specific id.
put.description:
You can update a service item by providing the id and the item in the body
You can change the name or description of the service after creation. This can also be done for any other language in your system.
It is also possible to specify different types of a service:
- 0 (Category)
- 1 (Service)
A category can contain multiple services. Add the id of the category as ParentId in the request model to specify in which category the service should be added.

delete.summary: Deletes entity with a specific id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the entity to delete

post.summary: Creates a new service item.
post.description:
You can create a document by providing the the serviceItem in the body
On creation, the name and description of the service will be set as german text as default.
If you have other languages in your system, please use the put request to add the texts for other languages as well.
It is also possible to specify different types of a service:
- 0 (Category)
- 1 (Service)
A category can contain multiple services. Add the id of the category as ParentId in the request model to specify in
which category the service should be added.

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer 12345abcdef"
Bearer.name: Authorization
